desc: All natural soy wax candles that are lovingly hand poured in Lively, Ontario, Canada. We have over 80 fragrances that are toxin-free, eco-friendly and are absolutely delicious! We also carry Unscented Emergency Candles, our amazing Cold & Sinus Relief Candle, Unscented Soy Wax Tea Lights, and Wax Warmers and Diffusers

layout.text: Our wide selection of fragrances that will are long lasting and have an amazing scent throw. The Signature Collection is a great place to start!
